title: Voice of the Mirror: Children will pay in school cuts as Tories send education the way of ailing NHS
text:
Get politics   Thank you for subscribing!   
Deep Tory education cuts threaten to do to our schools what squeezed Government spending is doing to an ailing NHS. 
Theresa May might talk a good game but in reality the first real terms reduction in cash for pupils in more than 20 years will harm our children's learning. 
How short-sighted of the hypocritical, deceitful Tories to target kids when education is a route to social mobility and prosperity. Our nation's future depends on a knowledge economy to compete in a fierce world. 
Sacking teachers, scrapping music lessons, turning off the heating, cancelling trips and all the other drastic measures hard-pressed heads would be forced to impose will create lower performing, miserable schools. Read More Lesson in stupidity: Savage chop in classroom as schools face first real-time cuts in 20 years 
The Prime Minister will wield the knife behind that fixed smile unless parents rise up and demand she backs off and guarantees education in England the money it needs. 
Here's another issue for Labour and Jeremy Corbyn to get their teeth into after the crushing defeat in the Copeland by-election. 
When parents see what is coming down the schoolcorridor Mrs May deserves to be in big trouble. Like us on Facebook
